turkish_example_sentence: Biz bu heyecan verici macera hikayesini anlatsak, çocuklar uyumayacak.
english_example_sentence: If we were to tell this exciting adventure story, the children would not sleep.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы рассказали эту захватывающую историю приключений, дети не спали бы.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz bu heyecan verici macera hikayesini ______, çocuklar uyumayacak.
